original_text: “The noise of a carefree crowd was around her; drunkards were brought from the desert along with men from the rabble, and they put bracelets on the wrists of the woman and her sister and beautiful crowns on their heads.
korean_text: 그 무리와 편히 지껄이고 즐겼으며 또 광야에서 잡류와 술 취한 사람을 청하여 오매 그들이 팔찌를 그 손목에 끼우고 아름다운 관을 그 머리에 씌웠도다

sentences.original_text: The noise of a carefree crowd was around her
sentences.korean_translation: 걱정 없는 군중의 소음이 그녀 주위에 있었네

sentences.original_text: drunkards were brought from the desert
along with men from the rabble
they put bracelets on the wrists
of the woman and her sister
and beautiful crowns on their heads
